sense.gloss: to see, to look, to watch, to view, to observe
to examine, to look over, to assess, to check, to judge
to look after, to attend to, to take care of, to keep an eye on
to experience, to meet with (misfortune, success, etc.)
to try ..., to have a go at ..., to give ... a try
scolding, reprimand, rebuke, admonition, cautioning, warning
show, display, pretensions, appearances, ostentation, vanity
to be seen, to be visible, to be in sight
to look, to seem, to appear
splendid, magnificent, excellent, fine, superb, beautiful, admirable
viewpoint, point of view, way of looking (at something), view, angle
way of appreciating (e.g. opera), way of understanding, how to read (a map, train timetable, etc.)
inspection, study by observation, field trip, tour, review
to make (something or someone) look ..., to present an appearance of ...
to make (something) worth watching, to be entertaining
to make a show of (doing), to do in a conspicuous manner, to do in view of others
to resolve to do, to do at any cost, to show others that one will ...
to discover, to find (e.g. an error in a book), to come across, to detect, to spot
to locate, to find (e.g. something missing), to find fault
to be used to seeing, to be familiar with
apparently, seemingly, at first glance, on the face of it
hope, promise, possibility, chance, probability, likelihood
to (happen to) see, to notice, to catch sight of
to be found, to be discovered
to re-examine (policy, estimate, plan, etc.), to review
to get a better opinion of, to see in a more positive light
to improve, to recover (market, illness, etc.)
must-see, not to be missed, a must
letting a good ball go by
to stare (at), to gaze (at), to look hard (at), to watch intently, to fix one's eyes (on)
visiting ill or distressed people, writing get-well letters
expression of sympathy, expression of concern, enquiry, inquiry

x: 見物人・けんぶつにん
見物客・けんぶつきゃく

sense.gloss: to watch over, to keep watch over, to keep an eye on
to watch intently, to stare, to gaze, to watch (and see what happens), to follow
to find out, to discover, to notice, to detect
to be wide-eyed (in surprise, anger, etc.)
(formal) meeting with a view to marriage, interview with a prospective spouse
two different options such that if one player takes one, the other player can take the other
to actually exist, to exist right now, to exist right in front of one
first visit to inn, restaurant, etc. without an introduction
to have an audience, to meet, to see

x: 見られる・みられる・2

sense.gloss: to try, to attempt, to have a go (at)
sight, attraction, spectacle, something worth seeing

sdata.j: ↑長↑↓なが↓い↑目↑↓め↓で↑見↑↓み↓れば↑違↑↓ちが↓ってくると↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I suppose it's different when you think about it over the long term.

sdata.j: ↑好↑↓す↓きなものが↑見↑↓み↓つけると、↑高↑↓たか↓すぎる。
sdata.e: Whenever I find something I like, it's too expensive.

sdata.j: ↑歌詞↑↓かし↓を↑見↑↓み↓てみれば、あまり↑意味↑↓いみ↓が↑無↑↓な↓いことに↑気付↑↓きづ↓くでしょう。
sdata.e: If you look at the lyrics, they don't really mean much.

sdata.j: ↑丸↑↓まる↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓オンラインで↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑見↑↓み↓ないなんてびっくりだよ。
sdata.e: It almost scared me not to see you online for a whole day.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓よりも↑物知↑↓ものし↓りな↑数学↑↓すうがく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のことをはっきりと↑表現↑↓ひょうげん↓できていないのを↑見↑↓み↓るのは↑心地↑↓ここち↓の↑良↑↓よ↓いものではない。
sdata.e: I don't like it when mathematicians who know much more than I do can't express themselves explicitly.

sdata.j: ロボットなんかに↑私↑↓わたし↓がなるわけないでしょう？ロボットは↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑見↑↓み↓ないんだから。
sdata.e: How could I be a robot? Robots don't dream.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑力↑↓ちから↓を↑甘↑↓あま↓く↑見↑↓み↓ないで。
sdata.e: Don't underestimate my power.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓の↑力↑↓ちから↓を↑見↑↓み↓くびるなよ。
sdata.e: Don't underestimate my power.

sdata.j: 「↑洞穴↑↓ほらあな↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こっているんだろう？すごく↑知↑↓し↓りたいなあ」「↑見当↑↓けんとう↓もつかないよ」
sdata.e: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."

sdata.j: もし↑間違↑↓まちが↓いを↑見↑↓み↓つけたら↑訂正↑↓ていせい↓してください。
sdata.e: If you see a mistake, then please correct it.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑駅↑↓えき↓を↑出↑↓で↓た↑時↑↓とき↓、↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: When I left the train station, I saw a man.

sdata.j: 「あの↑音↑↓おと↓で↑考↑↓かんが↓え↑事↑↓ごと↓ができないわ」と、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はタイプライターを↑見↑↓み↓つめながら↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: I can't think with that noise, she said, as she stared at the typewriter.

sdata.j: ↑年月↑↓としつき↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑物事↑↓ものごと↓がどう↑変↑↓か↓わっていくか↑見↑↓み↓るのは↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓そうだ。
sdata.e: It would be fun to see how things change over the years.

sdata.j: ↑物事↑↓ものごと↓は、ありのまま↑見↑↓み↓るのではなく、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓をそこに↑見↑↓み↓る。
sdata.e: We don't see things as they are, but as we are.

sdata.j: あなたは↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑誰↑↓だれ↓も↑見↑↓み↓ていなかった↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓で↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: You found me where no one else was looking.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑話↑↓はな↓しているときは↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑見↑↓み↓て！
sdata.e: Look at me when I talk to you!

sdata.j: ほとんどの↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓のことについての↑発見↑↓はっけん↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない。
sdata.e: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.

sdata.j: あまり↑見↑↓み↓えない。
sdata.e: I see it rarely.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はめったにそれを↑見↑↓み↓ません。
sdata.e: I see it rarely.

sdata.j: なぜ↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓は↑映画↑↓えいが↓を↑見↑↓み↓に↑行↑↓い↓くのか？
sdata.e: Why do people go to the movies?

sdata.j: やる↑気↑↓き↓があれば↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓は↑見↑↓み↓つかるもの。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: ↑探↑↓さが↓す↑人↑↓ひと↓が、↑見↑↓み↓つけるのだ。
sdata.e: Who searches, finds.

sdata.j: あなたは↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑見↑↓み↓させてくれるのね。
sdata.e: You make me dream.

sdata.j: どんな↑意見↑↓いけん↓も↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓と↑誤↑↓あやま↓りの↑混合↑↓こんごう↓だ。
sdata.e: Every opinion is a mixture of truth and mistakes.

sdata.j: もし↑二人↑↓ふたり↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑常↑↓つね↓に↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑持↑↓も↓っていたら、そのうちの↑一↑↓ひと↓↑人↑↓り↓は↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓ない。
sdata.e: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.

sdata.j: ↑意見↑↓いけん↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑掌握↑↓しょうあく↓し、↑信念↑↓しんねん↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑掌握↑↓しょうあく↓する。
sdata.e: Our opinion is an idea which we have; our conviction an idea which has us.

sdata.j: ↑今朝↑↓けさ↓テレビを↑見↑↓み↓ました。
sdata.e: I watched TV this morning.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓に↑何↑↓なん↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑鏡↑↓かがみ↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑見↑↓み↓ているの？
sdata.e: How many times a day do you look at yourself in the mirror?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑弟↑↓おとうと↓はテレビを↑見↑↓み↓ている。
sdata.e: My little brother is watching TV.

sdata.j: ↑全↑↓ぜん↓↑生徒↑↓せいと↓がプロムの↑夜↑↓よる↓↑礼儀↑↓れいぎ↓↑正↑↓ただ↓しく↑振↑↓ふ↓る↑舞↑↓ま↓っているのを↑見↑↓み↓て↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いた。
sdata.e: It was a surprise to see all the students behaving with decorum on prom night.
